alert.note: Alert for Calhoun; Franklin; Gulf; Jackson; Liberty (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 15 at 8:07PM EDT until April 15 at 8:30PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 830 PM EDT/730 PM CDT/ FOR EASTERN JACKSON...SOUTHERN GULF AND NORTHEASTERN CALHOUN COUNTIES IN THE PANHANDLE OF FLORIDA...LIBERTY AND FRANKLIN COUNTIES IN BIG BEND OF FLORIDA... At 807 PM EDT/707 PM CDT/, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 10 miles southwest of West Bainbridge to near Greensboro to 19 miles southwest of Midway to 13 miles northwest of Carrabelle to near Eastpoint, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Carrabelle, Eastpoint, Apalachicola, St George Island, Port St. Joe, Blountstown, Chattahoochee, Orange, Franklin, Malone, Sneads, Bristol, Grand Ridge, Bascom, Rock Bluff, Jewel Fire Tower, Ocheesee, Selman, Royal Bluff and Vilas. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
